170/**
171 * Helper utility to build protocol buffer requests, or build components for protocol buffer
172 * requests.
173 */
174@InterfaceAudience.Private
175public final class RequestConverter {
176
177  private RequestConverter() {
178  }
179
180  // Start utilities for Client
181
182  /**
183   * Create a protocol buffer GetRequest for a client Get
184   * @param regionName the name of the region to get
185   * @param get        the client Get
186   * @return a protocol buffer GetRequest
187   */
188  public static GetRequest buildGetRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Get get)
189    throws IOException {
190    GetRequest.Builder builder = GetRequest.newBuilder();
191    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
192    builder.setRegion(region);
193    builder.setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(get));
194    return builder.build();
195  }
196
197  /**
198   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a conditioned put/delete/increment/append
199   * @return a mutate request
200   */
201  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final byte[] row,
202    final byte[] family, final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op, final byte[] value,
203    final Filter filter, final TimeRange timeRange, final Mutation mutation, long nonceGroup,
204    long nonce) throws IOException {
205    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
206    if (mutation instanceof Increment || mutation instanceof Append) {
207      builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, nonce))
208        .setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
209    } else {
210      builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation));
211    }
212    return builder.setRegion(buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName))
213      .setCondition(ProtobufUtil.toCondition(row, family, qualifier, op, value, filter, timeRange))
214      .build();
215  }
216
217  /**
218   * Create a protocol buffer MultiRequest for conditioned row mutations
219   * @return a multi request
220   */
221  public static ClientProtos.MultiRequest buildMultiRequest(final byte[] regionName,
222    final byte[] row, final byte[] family, final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op,
223    final byte[] value, final Filter filter, final TimeRange timeRange,
224    final RowMutations rowMutations, long nonceGroup, long nonce) throws IOException {
225    return buildMultiRequest(regionName, rowMutations,
226      ProtobufUtil.toCondition(row, family, qualifier, op, value, filter, timeRange), nonceGroup,
227      nonce);
228  }
229
230  /**
231   * Create a protocol buffer MultiRequest for row mutations
232   * @return a multi request
233   */
234  public static ClientProtos.MultiRequest buildMultiRequest(final byte[] regionName,
235    final RowMutations rowMutations, long nonceGroup, long nonce) throws IOException {
236    return buildMultiRequest(regionName, rowMutations, null, nonceGroup, nonce);
237  }
238
239  private static ClientProtos.MultiRequest buildMultiRequest(final byte[] regionName,
240    final RowMutations rowMutations, final Condition condition, long nonceGroup, long nonce)
241    throws IOException {
242    RegionAction.Builder builder =
243      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(RegionAction.newBuilder(), regionName);
244    builder.setAtomic(true);
245
246    boolean hasNonce = false;
247    ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder = ClientProtos.Action.newBuilder();
248    MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
249    for (Mutation mutation : rowMutations.getMutations()) {
250      mutationBuilder.clear();
251      MutationProto mp;
252      if (mutation instanceof Increment || mutation instanceof Append) {
253        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder, nonce);
254        hasNonce = true;
255      } else {
256        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder);
257      }
258      actionBuilder.clear();
259      actionBuilder.setMutation(mp);
260      builder.addAction(actionBuilder.build());
261    }
262
263    if (condition != null) {
264      builder.setCondition(condition);
265    }
266
267    MultiRequest.Builder multiRequestBuilder = MultiRequest.newBuilder();
268    if (hasNonce) {
269      multiRequestBuilder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
270    }
271
272    return multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build()).build();
273  }
274
275  /**
276   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a put
277   * @return a mutate request
278   */
279  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Put put)
280    throws IOException {
281    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
282    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
283    builder.setRegion(region);
284    builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.PUT, put, MutationProto.newBuilder()));
285    return builder.build();
286  }
287
288  /**
289   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for an append
290   * @return a mutate request
291   */
292  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Append append,
293    long nonceGroup, long nonce) throws IOException {
294    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
295    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
296    builder.setRegion(region);
297    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE && nonceGroup != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
298      builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
299    }
300    builder.setMutation(
301      ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.APPEND, append, MutationProto.newBuilder(), nonce));
302    return builder.build();
303  }
304
305  /**
306   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a client increment
307   * @return a mutate request
308   */
309  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Increment increment,
310    final long nonceGroup, final long nonce) throws IOException {
311    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
312    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
313    builder.setRegion(region);
314    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE && nonceGroup != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
315      builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
316    }
317    builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT, increment,
318      MutationProto.newBuilder(), nonce));
319    return builder.build();
320  }
321
322  /**
323   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a delete
324   * @return a mutate request
325   */
326  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Delete delete)
327    throws IOException {
328    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
329    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
330    builder.setRegion(region);
331    builder.setMutation(
332      ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, delete, MutationProto.newBuilder()));
333    return builder.build();
334  }
335
336  public static RegionAction.Builder getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(
337    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final byte[] regionName) {
338    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
339    regionActionBuilder.setRegion(region);
340    return regionActionBuilder;
341  }
342
343  /**
344   * Create a protocol buffer ScanRequest for a client Scan
345   * @return a scan request
346   */
347  public static ScanRequest buildScanRequest(byte[] regionName, Scan scan, int numberOfRows,
348    boolean closeScanner) throws IOException {
349    ScanRequest.Builder builder = ScanRequest.newBuilder();
350    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
351    builder.setNumberOfRows(numberOfRows);
352    builder.setCloseScanner(closeScanner);
353    builder.setRegion(region);
354    builder.setScan(ProtobufUtil.toScan(scan));
355    builder.setClientHandlesPartials(true);
356    builder.setClientHandlesHeartbeats(true);
357    builder.setTrackScanMetrics(scan.isScanMetricsEnabled());
358    if (scan.getLimit() > 0) {
359      builder.setLimitOfRows(scan.getLimit());
360    }
361    return builder.build();
362  }
363
364  /**
365   * Create a protocol buffer ScanRequest for a scanner id
366   * @return a scan request
367   */
368  public static ScanRequest buildScanRequest(long scannerId, int numberOfRows, boolean closeScanner,
369    boolean trackMetrics) {
370    ScanRequest.Builder builder = ScanRequest.newBuilder();
371    builder.setNumberOfRows(numberOfRows);
372    builder.setCloseScanner(closeScanner);
373    builder.setScannerId(scannerId);
374    builder.setClientHandlesPartials(true);
375    builder.setClientHandlesHeartbeats(true);
376    builder.setTrackScanMetrics(trackMetrics);
377    return builder.build();
378  }
379
380  /**
381   * Create a protocol buffer ScanRequest for a scanner id
382   * @return a scan request
383   */
384  public static ScanRequest buildScanRequest(long scannerId, int numberOfRows, boolean closeScanner,
385    long nextCallSeq, boolean trackMetrics, boolean renew, int limitOfRows) {
386    ScanRequest.Builder builder = ScanRequest.newBuilder();
387    builder.setNumberOfRows(numberOfRows);
388    builder.setCloseScanner(closeScanner);
389    builder.setScannerId(scannerId);
390    builder.setNextCallSeq(nextCallSeq);
391    builder.setClientHandlesPartials(true);
392    builder.setClientHandlesHeartbeats(true);
393    builder.setTrackScanMetrics(trackMetrics);
394    builder.setRenew(renew);
395    if (limitOfRows > 0) {
396      builder.setLimitOfRows(limitOfRows);
397    }
398    return builder.build();
399  }
400
401  /**
402   * Create a protocol buffer bulk load request
403   * @return a bulk load request
404   */
405  public static BulkLoadHFileRequest buildBulkLoadHFileRequest(
406    final List<Pair<byte[], String>> familyPaths, final byte[] regionName, boolean assignSeqNum,
407    final Token<?> userToken, final String bulkToken, boolean copyFiles, List<String> clusterIds,
408    boolean replicate) {
409    RegionSpecifier region =
410      RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
411
412    ClientProtos.DelegationToken protoDT = null;
413    if (userToken != null) {
414      protoDT = ClientProtos.DelegationToken.newBuilder()
415        .setIdentifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(userToken.getIdentifier()))
416        .setPassword(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(userToken.getPassword()))
417        .setKind(userToken.getKind().toString()).setService(userToken.getService().toString())
418        .build();
419    }
420
421    List<ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.FamilyPath> protoFamilyPaths =
422      new ArrayList<>(familyPaths.size());
423    if (!familyPaths.isEmpty()) {
424      ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.FamilyPath.Builder pathBuilder =
425        ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.FamilyPath.newBuilder();
426      for (Pair<byte[], String> el : familyPaths) {
427        protoFamilyPaths.add(pathBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(el.getFirst()))
428          .setPath(el.getSecond()).build());
429      }
430      pathBuilder.clear();
431    }
432
433    BulkLoadHFileRequest.Builder request = ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.newBuilder()
434      .setRegion(region).setAssignSeqNum(assignSeqNum).addAllFamilyPath(protoFamilyPaths);
435    if (userToken != null) {
436      request.setFsToken(protoDT);
437    }
438    if (bulkToken != null) {
439      request.setBulkToken(bulkToken);
440    }
441    request.setCopyFile(copyFiles);
442    if (clusterIds != null) {
443      request.addAllClusterIds(clusterIds);
444    }
445    request.setReplicate(replicate);
446    return request.build();
447  }
448
449  /**
450   * Create a protocol buffer multirequest with NO data for a list of actions (data is carried
451   * otherwise than via protobuf). This means it just notes attributes, whether to write the WAL,
452   * etc., and the presence in protobuf serves as place holder for the data which is coming along
453   * otherwise. Note that Get is different. It does not contain 'data' and is always carried by
454   * protobuf. We return references to the data by adding them to the passed in <code>data</code>
455   * param.
456   * <p>
457   * Propagates Actions original index.
458   * <p>
459   * The passed in multiRequestBuilder will be populated with region actions.
460   * @param regionName          The region name of the actions.
461   * @param actions             The actions that are grouped by the same region name.
462   * @param cells               Place to stuff references to actual data.
463   * @param multiRequestBuilder The multiRequestBuilder to be populated with region actions.
464   * @param regionActionBuilder regionActionBuilder to be used to build region action.
465   * @param actionBuilder       actionBuilder to be used to build action.
466   * @param mutationBuilder     mutationBuilder to be used to build mutation.
467   * @param nonceGroup          nonceGroup to be applied.
468   * @param indexMap            Map of created RegionAction to the original index for a
469   *                            RowMutations/CheckAndMutate within the original list of actions
470   */
471  public static void buildNoDataRegionActions(final byte[] regionName,
472    final Iterable<Action> actions, final List<ExtendedCellScannable> cells,
473    final MultiRequest.Builder multiRequestBuilder, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
474    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder,
475    long nonceGroup, final Map<Integer, Integer> indexMap) throws IOException {
476    regionActionBuilder.clear();
477    RegionAction.Builder builder =
478      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(regionActionBuilder, regionName);
479    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.Builder cpBuilder = null;
480    boolean hasNonce = false;
481    List<Action> rowMutationsList = new ArrayList<>();
482    List<Action> checkAndMutates = new ArrayList<>();
483
484    for (Action action : actions) {
485      Row row = action.getAction();
486      actionBuilder.clear();
487      actionBuilder.setIndex(action.getOriginalIndex());
488      mutationBuilder.clear();
489      if (row instanceof Get) {
490        Get g = (Get) row;
491        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(g)));
492      } else if (row instanceof Put) {
493        buildNoDataRegionAction((Put) row, cells, builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
494      } else if (row instanceof Delete) {
495        buildNoDataRegionAction((Delete) row, cells, builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
496      } else if (row instanceof Append) {
497        buildNoDataRegionAction((Append) row, cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder,
498          mutationBuilder);
499        hasNonce = true;
500      } else if (row instanceof Increment) {
501        buildNoDataRegionAction((Increment) row, cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder,
502          mutationBuilder);
503        hasNonce = true;
504      } else if (row instanceof RegionCoprocessorServiceExec) {
505        RegionCoprocessorServiceExec exec = (RegionCoprocessorServiceExec) row;
506        // DUMB COPY!!! FIX!!! Done to copy from c.g.p.ByteString to shaded ByteString.
507        org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.ByteString value =
508          org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.UnsafeByteOperations
509            .unsafeWrap(exec.getRequest().toByteArray());
510        if (cpBuilder == null) {
511          cpBuilder = ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.newBuilder();
512        } else {
513          cpBuilder.clear();
514        }
515        builder.addAction(actionBuilder
516          .setServiceCall(cpBuilder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(exec.getRow()))
517            .setServiceName(exec.getMethod().getService().getFullName())
518            .setMethodName(exec.getMethod().getName()).setRequest(value)));
519      } else if (row instanceof RowMutations) {
520        rowMutationsList.add(action);
521      } else if (row instanceof CheckAndMutate) {
522        checkAndMutates.add(action);
523      } else {
524        throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Multi doesn't support " + row.getClass().getName());
525      }
526    }
527    if (builder.getActionCount() > 0) {
528      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
529    }
530
531    // Process RowMutations here. We can not process it in the big loop above because
532    // it will corrupt the sequence order maintained in cells.
533    // RowMutations is a set of Puts and/or Deletes all to be applied atomically
534    // on the one row. We do separate RegionAction for each RowMutations.
535    // We maintain a map to keep track of this RegionAction and the original Action index.
536    for (Action action : rowMutationsList) {
537      builder.clear();
538      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(builder, regionName);
539
540      boolean hasIncrementOrAppend = buildNoDataRegionAction((RowMutations) action.getAction(),
541        cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
542      if (hasIncrementOrAppend) {
543        hasNonce = true;
544      }
545      builder.setAtomic(true);
546
547      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
548
549      // This rowMutations region action is at (multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1)
550      // in the overall multiRequest.
551      indexMap.put(multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1, action.getOriginalIndex());
552    }
553
554    // Process CheckAndMutate here. Similar to RowMutations, we do separate RegionAction for each
555    // CheckAndMutate and maintain a map to keep track of this RegionAction and the original
556    // Action index.
557    for (Action action : checkAndMutates) {
558      builder.clear();
559      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(builder, regionName);
560
561      CheckAndMutate cam = (CheckAndMutate) action.getAction();
562      builder
563        .setCondition(ProtobufUtil.toCondition(cam.getRow(), cam.getFamily(), cam.getQualifier(),
564          cam.getCompareOp(), cam.getValue(), cam.getFilter(), cam.getTimeRange()));
565
566      if (cam.getAction() instanceof Put) {
567        actionBuilder.clear();
568        mutationBuilder.clear();
569        buildNoDataRegionAction((Put) cam.getAction(), cells, builder, actionBuilder,
570          mutationBuilder);
571      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof Delete) {
572        actionBuilder.clear();
573        mutationBuilder.clear();
574        buildNoDataRegionAction((Delete) cam.getAction(), cells, builder, actionBuilder,
575          mutationBuilder);
576      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof Increment) {
577        actionBuilder.clear();
578        mutationBuilder.clear();
579        buildNoDataRegionAction((Increment) cam.getAction(), cells, action.getNonce(), builder,
580          actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
581        hasNonce = true;
582      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof Append) {
583        actionBuilder.clear();
584        mutationBuilder.clear();
585        buildNoDataRegionAction((Append) cam.getAction(), cells, action.getNonce(), builder,
586          actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
587        hasNonce = true;
588      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof RowMutations) {
589        boolean hasIncrementOrAppend = buildNoDataRegionAction((RowMutations) cam.getAction(),
590          cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
591        if (hasIncrementOrAppend) {
592          hasNonce = true;
593        }
594        builder.setAtomic(true);
595      } else {
596        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
597          "CheckAndMutate doesn't support " + cam.getAction().getClass().getName());
598      }
599
600      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
601
602      // This CheckAndMutate region action is at (multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1)
603      // in the overall multiRequest.
604      indexMap.put(multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1, action.getOriginalIndex());
605    }
606
607    if (!multiRequestBuilder.hasNonceGroup() && hasNonce) {
608      multiRequestBuilder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
609    }
610  }
611
612  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Put put,
613    final List<ExtendedCellScannable> cells, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
614    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder)
615    throws IOException {
616    cells.add(put);
617    regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder
618      .setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.PUT, put, mutationBuilder)));
619  }
620
621  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Delete delete,
622    final List<ExtendedCellScannable> cells, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
623    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder)
624    throws IOException {
625    int size = delete.size();
626    // Note that a legitimate Delete may have a size of zero; i.e. a Delete that has nothing
627    // in it but the row to delete. In this case, the current implementation does not make
628    // a KeyValue to represent a delete-of-all-the-row until we serialize... For such cases
629    // where the size returned is zero, we will send the Delete fully pb'd rather than have
630    // metadata only in the pb and then send the kv along the side in cells.
631    if (size > 0) {
632      cells.add(delete);
633      regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder
634        .setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.DELETE, delete, mutationBuilder)));
635    } else {
636      regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder
637        .setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, delete, mutationBuilder)));
638    }
639  }
640
641  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Increment increment,
642    final List<ExtendedCellScannable> cells, long nonce,
643    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder,
644    final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder) throws IOException {
645    cells.add(increment);
646    regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(
647      ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.INCREMENT, increment, mutationBuilder, nonce)));
648  }
649
650  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Append append,
651    final List<ExtendedCellScannable> cells, long nonce,
652    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder,
653    final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder) throws IOException {
654    cells.add(append);
655    regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(
656      ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.APPEND, append, mutationBuilder, nonce)));
657  }
658
659  /** Returns whether or not the rowMutations has a Increment or Append */
660  private static boolean buildNoDataRegionAction(final RowMutations rowMutations,
661    final List<ExtendedCellScannable> cells, long nonce,
662    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder,
663    final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder) throws IOException {
664    boolean ret = false;
665    for (Mutation mutation : rowMutations.getMutations()) {
666      mutationBuilder.clear();
667      MutationProto mp;
668      if (mutation instanceof Increment || mutation instanceof Append) {
669        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder,
670          nonce);
671        ret = true;
672      } else {
673        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder);
674      }
675      cells.add(mutation);
676      actionBuilder.clear();
677      regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(mp).build());
678    }
679    return ret;
680  }
681
682  private static MutationType getMutationType(Mutation mutation) {
683    if (mutation instanceof Put) {
684      return MutationType.PUT;
685    } else if (mutation instanceof Delete) {
686      return MutationType.DELETE;
687    } else if (mutation instanceof Increment) {
688      return MutationType.INCREMENT;
689    } else {
690      return MutationType.APPEND;
691    }
692  }

698   * Create a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest for a given region name
699   * @param regionName the name of the region to get info
700   * @return a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest
701   */
702  public static GetRegionInfoRequest buildGetRegionInfoRequest(final byte[] regionName) {
703    return buildGetRegionInfoRequest(regionName, false);
704  }
705
706  /**
707   * Create a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest for a given region name
708   * @param regionName             the name of the region to get info
709   * @param includeCompactionState indicate if the compaction state is requested
710   * @return a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest
711   */
712  public static GetRegionInfoRequest buildGetRegionInfoRequest(final byte[] regionName,
713    final boolean includeCompactionState) {
714    return buildGetRegionInfoRequest(regionName, includeCompactionState, false);
715  }
716
717  /**
718   * Create a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest,
719   * @param regionName             the name of the region to get info
720   * @param includeCompactionState indicate if the compaction state is requested
721   * @param includeBestSplitRow    indicate if the bestSplitRow is requested
722   * @return protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest
723   */
724  public static GetRegionInfoRequest buildGetRegionInfoRequest(final byte[] regionName,
725    final boolean includeCompactionState, boolean includeBestSplitRow) {
726    GetRegionInfoRequest.Builder builder = GetRegionInfoRequest.newBuilder();
727    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
728    builder.setRegion(region);
729    if (includeCompactionState) {
730      builder.setCompactionState(includeCompactionState);
731    }
732    if (includeBestSplitRow) {
733      builder.setBestSplitRow(includeBestSplitRow);
734    }
735    return builder.build();
736  }

742   */

744    GetRegionLoadRequest.Builder builder = GetRegionLoadRequest.newBuilder();
745    if (tableName != null) {
746      builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName));
747    }
748    return builder.build();
749  }

769   * Create a protocol buffer FlushRegionRequest for a given region name
770   * @param regionName   the name of the region to get info
771   * @param columnFamily column family within a region
772   * @return a protocol buffer FlushRegionRequest
773   */
774  public static FlushRegionRequest buildFlushRegionRequest(final byte[] regionName,
775    byte[] columnFamily, boolean writeFlushWALMarker) {
776    FlushRegionRequest.Builder builder = FlushRegionRequest.newBuilder();
777    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
778    builder.setRegion(region);
779    builder.setWriteFlushWalMarker(writeFlushWALMarker);
780    if (columnFamily != null) {
781      builder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(columnFamily));
782    }
783    return builder.build();

786  /**
787   * Create a protocol buffer OpenRegionRequest for a given region
788   * @param server       the serverName for the RPC
789   * @param region       the region to open
790   * @param favoredNodes a list of favored nodes
791   * @return a protocol buffer OpenRegionRequest
792   */
793  public static OpenRegionRequest buildOpenRegionRequest(ServerName server, final RegionInfo region,
794    List<ServerName> favoredNodes) {
795    OpenRegionRequest.Builder builder = OpenRegionRequest.newBuilder();
796    builder.addOpenInfo(buildRegionOpenInfo(region, favoredNodes, -1L));
797    if (server != null) {
798      builder.setServerStartCode(server.getStartcode());
799    }
800    builder.setMasterSystemTime(EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
801    return builder.build();
802  }
803
804  /**
805   * Create a protocol buffer UpdateFavoredNodesRequest to update a list of favorednode mappings
806   * @param updateRegionInfos a list of favored node mappings
807   * @return a protocol buffer UpdateFavoredNodesRequest
808   */
809  public static UpdateFavoredNodesRequest buildUpdateFavoredNodesRequest(
810    final List<Pair<RegionInfo, List<ServerName>>> updateRegionInfos) {
811    UpdateFavoredNodesRequest.Builder ubuilder = UpdateFavoredNodesRequest.newBuilder();
812    if (updateRegionInfos != null && !updateRegionInfos.isEmpty()) {
813      RegionUpdateInfo.Builder builder = RegionUpdateInfo.newBuilder();
814      for (Pair<RegionInfo, List<ServerName>> pair : updateRegionInfos) {
815        builder.setRegion(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(pair.getFirst()));
816        for (ServerName server : pair.getSecond()) {
817          builder.addFavoredNodes(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server));
818        }
819        ubuilder.addUpdateInfo(builder.build());
820        builder.clear();
821      }
822    }
823    return ubuilder.build();
824  }
825

831    WarmupRegionRequest.Builder builder = WarmupRegionRequest.newBuilder();
832    builder.setRegionInfo(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(regionInfo));
833    return builder.build();

883  /**
884   * Convert a byte array to a protocol buffer RegionSpecifier
885   * @param type  the region specifier type
886   * @param value the region specifier byte array value
887   * @return a protocol buffer RegionSpecifier
888   */
889  public static RegionSpecifier buildRegionSpecifier(final RegionSpecifierType type,
890    final byte[] value) {
891    RegionSpecifier.Builder regionBuilder = RegionSpecifier.newBuilder();
892    regionBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(value));
893    regionBuilder.setType(type);
894    return regionBuilder.build();
895  }

967  public static MergeTableRegionsRequest buildMergeTableRegionsRequest(
968    final byte[][] encodedNameOfdaughaterRegions, final boolean forcible, final long nonceGroup,
969    final long nonce) throws DeserializationException {
970    MergeTableRegionsRequest.Builder builder = MergeTableRegionsRequest.newBuilder();
971    for (int i = 0; i < encodedNameOfdaughaterRegions.length; i++) {
972      builder.addRegion(buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME,
973        encodedNameOfdaughaterRegions[i]));
974    }
975    builder.setForcible(forcible);
976    builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
977    builder.setNonce(nonce);
978    return builder.build();
979  }

989    builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
990    builder.setNonce(nonce);
991    return builder.build();

1080   */
1081  public static DisableTableRequest buildDisableTableRequest(final TableName tableName,
1082    final long nonceGroup, final long nonce) {
1083    DisableTableRequest.Builder builder = DisableTableRequest.newBuilder();
1084    builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName));
1085    builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
1086    builder.setNonce(nonce);
1087    return builder.build();
1088  }
1089
1090  /**
1091   * Creates a protocol buffer CreateTableRequest
1092   * @return a CreateTableRequest
1093   */
1094  public static CreateTableRequest buildCreateTableRequest(final TableDescriptor tableDescriptor,
1095    final byte[][] splitKeys, final long nonceGroup, final long nonce) {
1096    CreateTableRequest.Builder builder = CreateTableRequest.newBuilder();
1097    builder.setTableSchema(ProtobufUtil.toTableSchema(tableDescriptor));
1098    if (splitKeys != null) {
1099      for (byte[] key : splitKeys) {
1100        builder.addSplitKeys(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(key));
1101      }
1102    }
1103    builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
1104    builder.setNonce(nonce);
1105    return builder.build();
1106  }

1111   */
1112  public static ModifyTableRequest buildModifyTableRequest(final TableName tableName,
1113    final TableDescriptor tableDesc, final long nonceGroup, final long nonce,
1114    final boolean reopenRegions) {
1115    ModifyTableRequest.Builder builder = ModifyTableRequest.newBuilder();
1116    builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName));
1117    builder.setTableSchema(ProtobufUtil.toTableSchema(tableDesc));
1118    builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
1119    builder.setNonce(nonce);
1120    builder.setReopenRegions(reopenRegions);
1121    return builder.build();
1122  }

1155   */

1162    builder.setIncludeSysTables(includeSysTables);
1163    return builder.build();
1164  }

1182  /**
1183   * Creates a protocol buffer SetTableStateInMetaRequest
1184   * @param state table state to update in Meta
1185   * @return a SetTableStateInMetaRequest
1186   */
1187  public static SetTableStateInMetaRequest buildSetTableStateInMetaRequest(final TableState state) {
1188    return SetTableStateInMetaRequest.newBuilder().setTableState(state.convert())
1189      .setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(state.getTableName())).build();
1190  }
1191
1192  /**
1193   * Creates a protocol buffer SetRegionStateInMetaRequest
1194   * @param nameOrEncodedName2State list of regions states to update in Meta
1195   * @return a SetRegionStateInMetaRequest
1196   */
1197  public static SetRegionStateInMetaRequest
1198    buildSetRegionStateInMetaRequest(Map<String, RegionState.State> nameOrEncodedName2State) {
1199    SetRegionStateInMetaRequest.Builder builder = SetRegionStateInMetaRequest.newBuilder();
1200    nameOrEncodedName2State.forEach((name, state) -> {
1201      byte[] bytes = Bytes.toBytes(name);
1202      RegionSpecifier spec;
1203      if (RegionInfo.isEncodedRegionName(bytes)) {
1204        spec = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME, bytes);
1205      } else {
1206        spec = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, bytes);
1207      }
1208      builder.addStates(RegionSpecifierAndState.newBuilder().setRegionSpecifier(spec)
1209        .setState(state.convert()).build());
1210    });
1211    return builder.build();
1212  }

1329  /**
1330   * Create a RegionOpenInfo based on given region info and version of offline node
1331   */
1332  public static RegionOpenInfo buildRegionOpenInfo(RegionInfo region, List<ServerName> favoredNodes,
1333    long openProcId) {
1334    RegionOpenInfo.Builder builder = RegionOpenInfo.newBuilder();
1335    builder.setRegion(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(region));
1336    if (favoredNodes != null) {
1337      for (ServerName server : favoredNodes) {
1338        builder.addFavoredNodes(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server));
1339      }
1340    }
1341    builder.setOpenProcId(openProcId);
1342    return builder.build();
1343  }

1345  /**
1346   * Creates a protocol buffer NormalizeRequest
1347   * @return a NormalizeRequest
1348   */
1349  public static NormalizeRequest buildNormalizeRequest(NormalizeTableFilterParams ntfp) {
1350    final NormalizeRequest.Builder builder = NormalizeRequest.newBuilder();
1351    if (ntfp.getTableNames() != null) {
1352      builder.addAllTableNames(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableNameList(ntfp.getTableNames()));
1353    }
1354    if (ntfp.getRegex() != null) {
1355      builder.setRegex(ntfp.getRegex());
1356    }
1357    if (ntfp.getNamespace() != null) {
1358      builder.setNamespace(ntfp.getNamespace());
1359    }
1360    return builder.build();
1361  }

1379  /**
1380   * Creates a protocol buffer IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1381   * @param switchType see {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MasterSwitchType}
1382   * @return a IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1383   */
1384  public static IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1385    buildIsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest(MasterSwitchType switchType) {
1386    IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.Builder builder = IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.newBuilder();
1387    builder.setSwitchType(convert(switchType));
1388    return builder.build();
1389  }
1390
1391  /**
1392   * Creates a protocol buffer SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1393   * @param enabled     switch is enabled or not
1394   * @param synchronous set switch sync?
1395   * @param switchTypes see {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MasterSwitchType}, it is a list.
1396   * @return a SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1397   */
1398  public static SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest buildSetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest(boolean enabled,
1399    boolean synchronous, MasterSwitchType... switchTypes) {
1400    SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.Builder builder = SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.newBuilder();
1401    builder.setEnabled(enabled);
1402    builder.setSynchronous(synchronous);
1403    for (MasterSwitchType switchType : switchTypes) {
1404      builder.addSwitchTypes(convert(switchType));
1405    }
1406    return builder.build();
1407  }
1408
1409  private static MasterProtos.MasterSwitchType convert(MasterSwitchType switchType) {
1410    switch (switchType) {
1411      case SPLIT:
1412        return MasterProtos.MasterSwitchType.SPLIT;
1413      case MERGE:
1414        return MasterProtos.MasterSwitchType.MERGE;
1415      default:
1416        break;
1417    }
1418    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupport switch type:" + switchType);
1419  }

1421  public static ReplicationProtos.AddReplicationPeerRequest buildAddReplicationPeerRequest(
1422    String peerId, ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig, boolean enabled) {
1423    AddReplicationPeerRequest.Builder builder = AddReplicationPeerRequest.newBuilder();
1424    builder.setPeerId(peerId);
1425    builder.setPeerConfig(ReplicationPeerConfigUtil.convert(peerConfig));
1426    ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.Builder stateBuilder =
1427      ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.newBuilder();
1428    stateBuilder.setState(enabled
1429      ? ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.State.ENABLED
1430      : ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.State.DISABLED);
1431    builder.setPeerState(stateBuilder.build());
1432    return builder.build();
1433  }

1567  public static RecommissionRegionServerRequest
1568    buildRecommissionRegionServerRequest(ServerName server, List<byte[]> encodedRegionNames) {
1569    RecommissionRegionServerRequest.Builder builder = RecommissionRegionServerRequest.newBuilder();
1570    if (encodedRegionNames != null) {
1571      for (byte[] name : encodedRegionNames) {
1572        builder.addRegion(buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME, name));
1573      }
1574    }
1575    return builder.setServerName(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server)).build();
1576  }
1577
1578  private static List<HBaseProtos.ServerName> toProtoServerNames(List<ServerName> servers) {
1579    List<HBaseProtos.ServerName> pbServers = new ArrayList<>(servers.size());
1580    for (ServerName server : servers) {
1581      pbServers.add(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server));
1582    }
1583    return pbServers;
1584  }

1590      .setSyncReplicationState(ReplicationPeerConfigUtil.toSyncReplicationState(state)).build();

1594  public static MasterProtos.AssignsRequest toAssignRegionsRequest(List<String> encodedRegionNames,
1595    boolean override, boolean force) {
1596    MasterProtos.AssignsRequest.Builder b = MasterProtos.AssignsRequest.newBuilder();
1597    return b.addAllRegion(toEncodedRegionNameRegionSpecifiers(encodedRegionNames))
1598      .setOverride(override).setForce(force).build();
1599  }

1603    MasterProtos.UnassignsRequest.Builder b = MasterProtos.UnassignsRequest.newBuilder();
1604    return b.addAllRegion(toEncodedRegionNameRegionSpecifiers(encodedRegionNames))
1605      .setOverride(override).setForce(force).build();
1606  }

1608  public static MasterProtos.ScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest
1609    toScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest(List<ServerName> serverNames) {
1610    MasterProtos.ScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest.Builder builder =
1611      MasterProtos.ScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest.newBuilder();
1612    serverNames.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toServerName).forEach(sn -> builder.addServerName(sn));
1613    return builder.build();
1614  }
1615
1616  private static List<RegionSpecifier>
1617    toEncodedRegionNameRegionSpecifiers(List<String> encodedRegionNames) {
1618    return encodedRegionNames.stream()
1619      .map(r -> buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME, Bytes.toBytes(r)))
1620      .collect(Collectors.toList());
1621  }

1623  /**
1624   * Creates SetSnapshotCleanupRequest for turning on/off auto snapshot cleanup
1625   * @param enabled     Set to <code>true</code> to enable, <code>false</code> to disable.
1626   * @param synchronous If <code>true</code>, it waits until current snapshot cleanup is completed,
1627   *                    if outstanding.
1628   * @return a SetSnapshotCleanupRequest
1629   */
1630  public static SetSnapshotCleanupRequest buildSetSnapshotCleanupRequest(final boolean enabled,
1631    final boolean synchronous) {

1633      .build();

1643
1644  /**
1645   * Build RPC request payload for getLogEntries
1646   * @param filterParams map of filter params
1647   * @param limit        limit for no of records that server returns
1648   * @param logType      type of the log records
1649   * @return request payload {@link HBaseProtos.LogRequest}
1650   */
1651  public static HBaseProtos.LogRequest buildSlowLogResponseRequest(
1652    final Map<String, Object> filterParams, final int limit, final String logType) {
1653    SlowLogResponseRequest.Builder builder = SlowLogResponseRequest.newBuilder();
1654    builder.setLimit(limit);
1655    if (logType.equals("SLOW_LOG")) {
1656      builder.setLogType(SlowLogResponseRequest.LogType.SLOW_LOG);
1657    } else if (logType.equals("LARGE_LOG")) {
1658      builder.setLogType(SlowLogResponseRequest.LogType.LARGE_LOG);
1659    }
1660    boolean filterByAnd = false;
1661    if (MapUtils.isNotEmpty(filterParams)) {
1662      if (filterParams.containsKey("clientAddress")) {
1663        final String clientAddress = (String) filterParams.get("clientAddress");
1664        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(clientAddress)) {
1665          builder.setClientAddress(clientAddress);
1666        }
1667      }
1668      if (filterParams.containsKey("regionName")) {
1669        final String regionName = (String) filterParams.get("regionName");
1670        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(regionName)) {
1671          builder.setRegionName(regionName);
1672        }
1673      }
1674      if (filterParams.containsKey("tableName")) {
1675        final String tableName = (String) filterParams.get("tableName");
1676        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(tableName)) {
1677          builder.setTableName(tableName);
1678        }
1679      }
1680      if (filterParams.containsKey("userName")) {
1681        final String userName = (String) filterParams.get("userName");
1682        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(userName)) {
1683          builder.setUserName(userName);
1684        }
1685      }
1686      if (filterParams.containsKey("filterByOperator")) {
1687        final String filterByOperator = (String) filterParams.get("filterByOperator");
1688        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(filterByOperator)) {
1689          if (filterByOperator.toUpperCase().equals("AND")) {
1690            filterByAnd = true;
1691          }
1692        }
1693      }
1694    }
1695    if (filterByAnd) {
1696      builder.setFilterByOperator(SlowLogResponseRequest.FilterByOperator.AND);
1697    } else {
1698      builder.setFilterByOperator(SlowLogResponseRequest.FilterByOperator.OR);
1699    }
1700    SlowLogResponseRequest slowLogResponseRequest = builder.build();
1701    return HBaseProtos.LogRequest.newBuilder()
1702      .setLogClassName(slowLogResponseRequest.getClass().getName())
1703      .setLogMessage(slowLogResponseRequest.toByteString()).build();
1704  }
1705
1706  /**
1707   * Create a protocol buffer {@link ClearSlowLogResponseRequest}
1708   * @return a protocol buffer ClearSlowLogResponseRequest
1709   */
1710  public static ClearSlowLogResponseRequest buildClearSlowLogResponseRequest() {
1711    return ClearSlowLogResponseRequest.newBuilder().build();
1712  }
1713
1714  public static MoveServersRequest buildMoveServersRequest(Set<Address> servers,
1715    String targetGroup) {
1716    Set<HBaseProtos.ServerName> hostPorts = Sets.newHashSet();
1717    for (Address el : servers) {
1718      hostPorts.add(HBaseProtos.ServerName.newBuilder().setHostName(el.getHostname())
1719        .setPort(el.getPort()).build());
1720    }
1721    return MoveServersRequest.newBuilder().setTargetGroup(targetGroup).addAllServers(hostPorts)
1722      .build();
1723  }
1724
1725  public static RemoveServersRequest buildRemoveServersRequest(Set<Address> servers) {
1726    Set<HBaseProtos.ServerName> hostPorts = Sets.newHashSet();
1727    for (Address el : servers) {
1728      hostPorts.add(HBaseProtos.ServerName.newBuilder().setHostName(el.getHostname())
1729        .setPort(el.getPort()).build());
1730    }
1731    return RemoveServersRequest.newBuilder().addAllServers(hostPorts).build();
1732  }
1733
1734  public static FlushTableRequest buildFlushTableRequest(final TableName tableName,
1735    final List<byte[]> columnFamilies, final long nonceGroup, final long nonce) {
1736    FlushTableRequest.Builder builder = FlushTableRequest.newBuilder();
1737    builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName));
1738    if (!columnFamilies.isEmpty()) {
1739      for (byte[] columnFamily : columnFamilies) {
1740        builder.addColumnFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(columnFamily));
1741      }
1742    }
1743    return builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup).setNonce(nonce).build();
1744  }
1745}
